original_text: And the Syrians had gone out by companies, and had brought away captive out of the land of Israel a little maid; and she waited on Naaman's wife.
korean_text: 전에 아람 사람이 떼를 지어 나가서 이스라엘 땅에서 어린 소녀 하나를 사로잡으매 그가 나아만의 아내에게 수종들더니

sentences.original_text: And the Syrians had gone out by companies
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 시리아 사람들은 무리를 지어 나왔으며

sentences.original_text: and had brought away captive out of the land of Israel a little maid
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 땅에서 어린 하녀를 사로잡아 데려왔고

sentences.original_text: and she waited on Naaman's wife
